name: object_detection
template: urisourcebin uri="{source[uri]}" ! concat name=c ! decodebin ! vaapipostproc name="vaapipostproc" ! video/x-raw,width=300,height=300 ! gvadetect model="{models[object_detection][1][network]}" model-proc="{models[object_detection][1][proc]}" name="detection" ! gvametaconvert converter=json method=detection source="{source[uri]}" name="metaconvert" ! queue ! gvametapublish name="destination" ! tee name=t ! queue ! appsink name=appsink t. ! queue ! vaapisink sync=false
